channel.title: Can I Edit the Graphics? I Mean the Player, grass and Mines ETC
channel.description:
Hey,
I was wondering about it was possible to edit the ground graphics? Players, trees, stones, mines, ground, rocks, water ?
Because it had been so fun if I could edit it =)
So... I have never seen this before edited, and I wonder about it is because it's either Difficult, not possible OR Noone have thought about it before?
Please give me an answer =)
~Thanks for reading! ~DracoWizard2

item.title: Can I Edit the Graphics? I Mean the Player, grass and Mines ETC
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Yes it cane but not with server you need to edit your client if you got if you dont got go download one

Read full topic
